name: Julien Look
role: Software Engineer, Data Scientist, Fullstack Engineer

cloud_platforms: AWS (Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, Cognito, EC2, S3)

projects.title: MLOps Seminar
projects.description: Designed and led a hands-on MLOps seminar covering automated data wrangling, ML lifecycle management, monitoring, and orchestration. Provided real-world case studies and interactive labs to help participants implement modern MLOps techniques.

projects.title: R-Cycle Customer Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a dashboard to track plastic production cycles, helping manufacturers comply with recycling mandates. Focused on architectural improvements and UI optimizations. Built reusable UI components in React and integrated with Google Cloud Platform.

projects.title: Remote Robot Operation App
projects.description: Built a remote robot operation platform with navigation tracking and performance analysis. Developed a React.js frontend and a Python Flask backend. Implemented real-time navigation tracking with OpenCV and integrated performance analysis with MLflow and Scikit-Learn.

projects.title: AI Parent Advisor
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered chatbot for parenting advice using OpenAI GPT models and WhatsApp API. Designed and scaled a microservices architecture with NX Monorepo. Built a React.js dashboard for user behavior analytics. Managed AWS infrastructure, ensuring scalability and security.

projects.title: Shopify Storefront
projects.description: Developed a custom Shopify storefront using Remix.js (Hydrogen) and Shopify GraphQL APIs. Led a team of four developers, overseeing both technical architecture and UI/UX design. Set up CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions to automate testing and deployment.

projects.title: Microsoft Teams Extension
projects.description: Developed a Microsoft Teams Message Extension, enabling seamless integration within enterprise workflows. Architected the Microsoft Azure environment, ensuring scalable cloud infrastructure. Implemented OAuth and Azure AD authentication for secure enterprise logins. Built a CI/CD pipeline to manage multi-environment releases.

projects.title: Listify
projects.description: Built an application to convert Spotify playlists into DJ setlists. Integrated a Selenium-based scraper to extract music metadata and developed a Flask-based backend.

projects.title: AI-Powered Tax Assistant
projects.description: Led the AI-driven automation of financial data processing. Rebuilt ETL pipelines and reduced cloud costs by 90%. Developed an AI chatbot for customer support and built real-time analytics dashboards using BigQuery.

projects.title: ML Research in Quality Science
projects.description: Conducted machine learning research in Quality Science. Developed anomaly detection models and contributed to research publications.

projects.title: ML Music Classification
projects.description: Developed CNN models for music classification. Built a deep learning pipeline to classify music by era using time series data.

projects.title: Bosch Linux Distribution
projects.description: Developed Debian-based Linux OS components for industrial automation. Implemented a security verification system for untrusted software installations.
